channel.title: mIrAgE pK pRoJeCt -RECRUITNG - WE NEED MORE PEOPLE TO JOIN THE PROJECT-
channel.description:
[URL=http://www.mybannermaker.com/][IMG]http://img401.imageshack.us/img401/913/mybannerglitterafd7c996iu6.gif[/img][/URL]
[size=20pt][color=red]before i start talking do not leech my server name! I had it done many times and if you do, I will kick your ass. So instead of leeching my server name come up with your own.[/color][/size]
We are currently recruiting for The Mirage Pk Project. If everyone joins in this would actually be the best pk project probably. So make a choice join us so we can make the ultimate project or code your own server each day by yourself alone. Server is based on Stan's isle due to it's tremendous fame and stability :D
Here's how to make your application
Name:(ur name...) postition:(choose what you can code) are you on alot:(yes, no) experience:(detail about your experience with coding whatever your coding) Devotion:(choose on a scale from 1-10 how devoted you are)
Here are the jobs- ---------------------------- server coder (coding the server in general) - - - ------------------------------ client coders - - ----------------------------- forums coder - - - - ------------------------------ server hoster -me currently - - - ---------------------------- Forum Mods: - - - -
----------------------------- Forum admins: snowycards - - -------------------------
Thank's for joing The Mirage Pk Project and hope you will sign up. Contact my msn woofdawg23@hotmail.com

are you on alot:Yes

Devotion:10+

~I_nubnub_I

[/quote]accepeted![/quote]

Thanks man, you didn’t choose wrong

I added you on msn, so we can talk through that.

~I_nubnub_I
